data.enText: to feel and show that you are sorry for sth bad or wrong that you have done
God welcomes the sinner who repents.

data.chText: 她对自己所做的事深感懊悔。
data.enText: She had repented of what she had done.

data.chText: 他开始后悔自己的草率决定。
data.enText: He came to repent his hasty decision (= wished he had not taken it) .

simple_means.memory_skill: re 反 + pent〔= pen〕惩罚 → 反过来惩罚自己 → 后悔

tr: turn away from sin or do penitence

value.def: If you repent, you show or say that you are sorry for something wrong you have done.

example.ex: Those who refuse to repent, he said, will be punished...
example.tran: 那些拒不悔改的人，他说，将会受到惩罚。

example.ex: Did he repent of anything in his life?
example.tran: 他一生中有什么后悔的事情吗？

partsOfSpeech.dec: im 不 + pun 惩罚 + ity 具备某种性质，状况 → 不受惩罚
pen 惩罚 + al …的 → 刑罚的
penal〔= pen〕惩罚 + ize 使 → 处罚
penal 刑罚的 + ty 表情况 → 惩罚
pen 惩罚 + ance 表状况 → 接受惩罚 → 赎罪
penit〔= pen〕惩罚 + ent 具有…性质的，关于…的 → 因受惩罚而后悔 → 后悔的
pun 惩罚 + ish 使… → 惩罚
punish 惩罚 + ment 表结果 → 惩罚
re 反 + pent〔= pen〕惩罚 → 反过来惩罚自己 → 后悔
